room_title: Escape room "Quarantine" by Expedition Escape in Montgomeryville
room_description:
There has been a pandemic outbreak of a horrible virus that spreads quickly and is always fatal. The lead scientist in your lab has developed an antidote but has fallen ill to the virus. You and your fellow survivors have to work together to unravel the sequence and recreate the cure. The virus is spreading and you have only one hour to decipher the clues before the outbreak spreads too far to be contained.
There are two identical "Quarantine" rooms available at the location. You can compete head to head with another group.
